variable.name: mr_other_neuro_CS1
variable.description: Other prevalent neurological disorder at time of MRI scan

variable.name: mr_prevstrk_CS1
variable.description: Prevalent stroke at time of MRI scan

variable.name: mr_prevdem_CS1
variable.description: Prevalent dementia at time of MRI scan

variable.name: mr_exclude_CS1
variable.description: Prevalent dementia, stroke or other neurological disorder (may want to exclude for analysis)

variable.name: any_deep
variable.description: Cerebral microbleed in a deeper region
variable.comment: A CMB is defined as deep if it is located in any of the following regions: basal ganglia, brainstem, caudate, thalamus, or cerebellum.

variable.name: any_lobar
variable.description: Cerebral microbleed in a lobar region
variable.comment: A CMB is defined as lobar if it is located in any of the following regions: frontal cortex, frontal white matter, occipital cortex, occipital white matter, parietal cortex, parietal white matter, temporal cortex, or temporal white matter.

variable.name: mrdate_cs1
variable.description: Date of MRI scan for CS1 cycle
